oai_dc:dc.dc:title: George Montgomery and Taina Elg visit to West End High School, Nashville, Tennessee, 1959
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Actor George Montgomery, at the podium with Finnish-American Hollywood actress and dancer Taina Elg, at West End High School, Nashville, Tennessee in 1959. During the event at West End High School, both actors were awarded Honorary Citizenship of Nashville by Nashville Mayor Ben West. This same year, the MGM film “Watusi,” with George Montgomery and Taina Elg was released nationwide. Montgomery was an American painter, sculptor, wood craftsman and stuntman who is best known as an actor in western style film and television. Montgomery was married to American singer, actress, and television personality Dinah Shore. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
